basic_information.scholarship_name: John Taylor Beresford Endowed Scholarship for Applied Mathematics and Computer Science Graduate

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics or the Department of Computer Science in Applied Mathematics  Computer Science or Computer Science option. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Applied Mathematics  Computer Science or Computer Science Graduate student Must be enrolled full-time 3.0 GPA or above Satisfactory progress in area of study Two letters of faculty reference/support

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Applied Math & Compt Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Applied Math Sci-Computer Sci   or SIS_Major is Applied Math & Compt Science   or SIS_Major is Computer Science   or SIS_Major is Applied Math Sci-Computer Sci
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Applied Math & Compt Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Applied Math Sci-Computer Sci   or SIS_Major is Applied Math & Compt Science   or SIS_Major is Computer Science   or SIS_Major is Applied Math Sci-Computer Sci
criteria.clean_description: Major: Applied Math & Compt Science, Applied Math Sci-Computer Sci, Computer Science

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
